description:
This library is designed for transforming objects through an object Mapper / Merger, which contains a set of actions for mapping properties from source object into destination object.
This library can be useful when applications need to transform business data into DTO objects, or maybe in another complex context when It's needed to apply dynamic transformation on imcompatibles objects through resolver containers.
releaseNotes:
New implementations for including / excluding property mappers in order to make easier source / merger instances using the new IContainerBuilder,
and new container resolver class which can be used for resolving incompatible properties.
summary: DynamicMapResolver is a library used for transforming  input objects into custom output objects through a set of actions which map properties from input  object type into output object type.
